content.question: If F1 is the magnitude of the force exerted by the Earth on a satellite in orbit about the Earth and F2 is the magnitude of the force exerted by the satellite on the Earth, then which of the following is true?

choices.label: F1 is much greater than F2.
F1 is slightly greater than F2.
F2 is slightly greater than F1.
F2 is much greater than F1.

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
